caption: It was excellent... the pasta entree was delicious... and the big and beautiful chocolate cake was divine...
Warm , and friendly along with very good meal.

Have been eating in Saratoga for 20 years and somehow didn't get to sperrys until now. They were listed on the Saratoga Restaurant Week and as a someone looking for vegetarian options I was excited after seeing the menu.  Made reservations …
Superb dining experience, service and food were wonderful!
Great service, better food. Found our new favorite dinner spot in Saratoga this past weekend!

Wasabi restaurant was closed so we wandered into this place.  My hubby and son shared the bone marrow/ox tail appetizer and boy was that delicious!!! The entire meal was great.  Waitress was great fun, older woman with blond hair. A bit …
Excellent food and attentive service.  Large patio for outdoor dining.
Food was wonderful and waitstaff was fabulous.  Our waiter was outstanding!!!  Name to follow.  John G.👏👏
Their menu doesn't match what they serve. Food was okay at best. Better options around IMHO.

We were not acknowledged at all upon our arrival. It took 45 minutes to seat us even though we had a confirmed 8pm reservation. We requested downstairs seating and said just waiting for table to pay the check and you’ll be allset. Then they …
Excellent time ,great food and service.
Food was great, drinks flowed well... Clayton makes a mean whisky sour.
Great food nice outdoor atmosphere
Great food; fabulous service from Beth & Sarah. Nice relaxing patio. The steamed clsms were delicious as was the skirt steak & Bolognese sauce. Responsibly priced.
The food & hospitality are very good. As well as service.

Service was great. Our waitress was readily available and was so positive. Drinks and food took quite some time but it was worth the wait. The waitress was kind to take pictures of the family while we waited.
The atmosphere, the food, everything! Me and my family came here for Christmas eve dinner with a party of 10 and had a great time! I recommend to anyone looking for an awesome night!
Fantastic New Year's Eve dinner!  Delicious swordfish and veal, and incredible service.  We'll be back.

Old-fashioned Elegance and fantastic food. One of the oldest restaurants in Saratoga Springs, and one of the nicest. The menu is continental and American. The prices a medium to high but worth every penny. I go back to this place over and over again. Highly recommended.

Well all I did was get food to go . It took three phone calls , a hostess who didn't know anything   but was all heart . Just not trained right . The Steak was wow ...in a bad way. The burgers were pretty darn good . They were the highlight. Rumor has they're closing. I can see why .
In the Weeds Tonight. Restaurant week.
still love this place. limited Italian.. service was great and fun!
Yummy and a nice atmosphere

Pleasant atmosphere. We were party of 6. All seemed to enjoy their dinners. Swordfish was exceptional! However, chicken wouldn't be available for 1 1/2 hours and my medallions of veal dish was too salty. Missed items from a previous  menu. Espresso martinis 😊  Will return. It's a favorite!
GREAT FOOD
Food is top of the line
Normal fine dining: wonderful food and drink, expensive prices, small portions
Very good food. Johanna is a great server.
The Service was poorly the food ok they can improve by having the right staff
Great food, nice atmosphere, attentive and knowledgeable service
Upscale yet very friendly.  Great food!
Nice place good food
Didn’t even have the table ready at the time our reservation was.... Great service. NOT
Great food
Good food...good service...crowded this time of year.
Dirty glasses - two out of three - sort of ruined the experience.
You can always get a great dinner at Sperry's. It's a must stop when your in Saratoga.
Always good, a Saratoga landmark.
Very good! Loved it! Pricey but great!

Our server, Rachel, knew the ins and outs of the menu, was super friendly and made our experience that much more relaxing and enjoyable. Such a sweetheart! The wasabi shrimp was fantastic and the lamb ragout and lemon chicken were amazing! What a way to celebrate 15 years of marriage! Thank you, Sperry!!!
Great food and an excellent ambiance.
Excellent service and the food was amazing.
Best steak
Amazing food. All the way Simms around.
My steak was mediocre at best. My wifes pork chop was dry. Candied walnutsvon my wifes salad were "different". Oyster appetizers were good. Popovers were good. Our waiter was excellent.
Food and vibe are fantastic. Love their twist on a Moscow mule
Love the food here! Trendy place to visit during track season. Fine dining but casual dress.

Amazing place.  Had a wonderful 3 course meal(restaurant week) that included an appetizer, entree and dessert for $30. The was an up charge for the higher end entrees, but well worth it. Family friendly, as we brought our 21mo old, and they made her some pasta off the menu. Can't wait to go back.
The ambiance is very pleasant. Our waiter was 5 stars !! Food was good but too salty for us. Mussels were wonderful but calamari was a little chewy. Overall a good experience.
Sat at bar for drinks and apps....best lobster bisque I think I have ever had....
Great food!! Great ambiance!  Saratoga prices.
Nice place, my salon was a little dry but my friends meal was delicious.
Chowder fest!!! Great chowder great place

I’ve had many great meals at Sperry’s in the past and it’s often my go to restaurant for a special event dinner! Their outdoor patio is my favorite in the summer so I would definitely recommend checking it out once the warmer weather is back!
Excellent steak nice atmosphere good service after track fav

Came here with a group of friends, at their suggestion, during Chowderfest.  Not only did they serve up some of the best Damn chowder ice ever had, but they also have a knack for warming up their guests with some delicious Irish coffee. I …
The lobster risotto was excellent and the wait staff outstanding!
I always come here on restaurant week, they do a fabulous prefix menu.
Our meal today on New year's Eve with simply excellent as well as the service excellent.
Great outside bar but they don't utilize the place to its potential. Inside is too small and noisy. Food is about average in the area.
Amazing
There's a reason Sperry's is still there after 80 something years. Food, drinks, atmosphere... all the best in town.
Very good food. Wait staff are very attentive. A great way to spend a Friday night!😋
Delicious food, nice place!

4 experienced diners had meat, seafood and pasta and all the dishes were excellent. The service was also very good with helpful advice on wine and menu items. Truly a superior meal with nothing to complain about!
We're in Saratoga Springs once a year for business. Sperry's is always a favorite. Oh, the oysters......so lovely! Dirty Martinis are fantastic!
Great food. .. great atmosphere.!
We ate here as big group. Food was average to below at best. Bar staff were seemingly rude but obviously very busy with large group.
Best steak in Upstate NY,  period.
Great atmosphere, great place to relax after a day work, the food is excellent. Everything excellent.
Love the place!
Absolutely fantastic food. They start you off with a fresh popover which just tastes delightful!
This was one of the most top-notch dining experiences we’ve ever had. The food was decadent and completely satisfying. The service was excellent - we would highly recommend Sperry’s!
Absolutely amazing food. You can feel the history when you walk inside. I wish there were places like this in Australia!
Good service, okay portions

I had a large group.  Team there was great,  the atmosphere upstairs where we ate was fantastic.   Music is a bit too loud.  Food was outstanding.   We have eaten their a couple of times, upstairs outside is much better.
Great buffet and great staff!
Great food!
A must visit, great food,  superb service and wonderful atmosphere
Elegant atmosphere, quality service, and steak to die for. Perfect for a special night out.
Food was excellent as always. Service also. Portions large making the price very reasonable for a top notch Saratoga restaurant.
Food very slow. About twemty minutes between appetizer pickup and entree arrival. Lost appetite. Meatball app was good. Oysters not so much. Entree late and average.

My husband and I recently went to Sperry’s to celebrate our anniversary. We had only been there once before for restaurant week but enjoyed it so my mother-in-law purchased a $50 gift certificate for us so we could go there again. When my …
What a nice place to eat

Every time I come here make it a point to try a different flavor. I always get two scoops. My staple ice cream is the pistachio and then I switch up with flavors, I am never disappointed no matter what flavor it may be.
Top ten restaurant in toga
Very good food and friendly excellent service.  A landmark restaurant in Saratoga Springs.
Terrific menu, service, and preparation. Outdoor four-seasons bar is wonderful.
Wonderful Oysters and wines on Tuesday nights
Had a great meal tonight.
Great outdoor courtyard for track season summer socializing.
Great food. Fantastic service. You won't be disappointed !!!
Martina, Courtney, and Kalei are awesome bartenders. We had a blast at Sperrys just because of these 3 great girls and fantastic cocktails. Best in the business!
Great Food
Awsome food... a little pricey though, but good
Great service, food, and met a famous jockey!
great place
Outstanding experience. Food was beyond excellent, service was beyond fantastic. Well worth it. Been one of our favorites for 20 years. You won't be sorry.
Excellent food and drink... parking is a problem...
Overpriced, lots  of mosquitoes on the patio , foods was  below average,  bouncer was rude and not helpful with guests walking in from patio area.  Awful experience!!

Mosquitos were biting us at the tables outside in the patio.  Risotto was hard, the Frutti di Mar had no clams and when we asked the server they just told us it was how the batch came out. They didn't bring us more clams. 4 of the clams in the other dish were closed. For the money spent which is overpriced, the quality is poor.
Love the decor!
Awesome outdoor patio in the back to grab a drink at in the summer time. Place can get very busy during the summer but nice atmosphere.
The salmon was to die for: fresh arugula,  fresh heirloom tomatos wonderful salsa verde. Best meal I've had in months!
Small menu
Great food and is like taking a step back in time.
Amazing staff and food!
Great staff. Attended a rehearsal dinner here. Great food. But the people really made the experience.

One of the pricier fancy joints in Saratoga. Easy to drop a couple hundred here on dinner for two, with drinks and dessert. Having said that, it's one of the best patio bar settings in the city. Like something out of a book.

It was for Valentine's Day celebration and the entrees were not up to our expectations.  For that kind of money we paid for, we were disappointed with the side veggies that came with the chicken and fish entree.  It was nothing to shout …
We came for dinner, had to wait a while and the food was not really all that special. Would not return. There are many other restaurants in Saratoga to choose from.

Absolutely delicious! From the fresh popovers to start to the cookies for dessert! The staff were wonderful, and I would highly recommend the Lamb Sliders. I'm half Lebanese, so I'm pretty picky when it comes to Mediterranean inspired food, …
Outstanding! From the moment we walked in, until the final spoonful of dessert. The appetizers, meal and dessert was fabulous. Our waiter ( Ben) - Amazing!!!

Fresh oysters and Arugula salad to start were cold fresh tasty.  Hanger steak fresh trout were cooked to perfection.  Potatoes were not hot...Quickly rectified.   Best meal in quite some time anywhere. Can't wait to return.  December 2012.

If I could give this place a higher rating then excellent all around I would.  This is now my favorite place to eat in Saratoga.  The menu is great.  The food is great.  The service is even better.  We had a meal served by Benny.  He knew the menu inside and out and made our experience in Sperry's fabulous.
